page.title: 10Farming.Hoo area cont.
page.content: The number of land-owning farmers has decreased,and farm units have got - and continue to get- larger.This has led to larger and more expensive machines and a reduction in the number of employees. For certain crops using expensive and very specialised equipment,several farms share machines in a farming group -examples are pea and bean harvesting and sugarbeet harvesting. The old traditional "mixed" farm now exists only with a very few small farms. Pig and poultry production is largely done under contract (not a suitable system for the small producer). A livestock market operates at nearby Wickham Market,but the Ipswich livestock market has recently closed.
